author: tobiwo
content: Happy new year everyone, shorts question: What are the latest image tags to run a kurtosis devnet with devnet-4 specs (or where can I find them)? Found this overview: https://hackmd.io/CgPV419yTsytULQlO4m6Qw but I guess there are also images available for erigon etc., are there?

author: parithosh
content:
